attributes.action: Can the PM tell LCC to stop the down-grading of Morley sports centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Morley PFI sport centre which is planned by Leeds City Council is smaller than the existing sports centre, and it does not meet the needs of a large town like Morley.
There will be no, squash, diving pool, sauna and fewer rooms for other activities.
